drinking-water-stations.name: DRINKING WATER STATION - BLUWAE Series
drinking-water-stations.description: Water dispensers with inbuilt purification â€”pure, safe water delivered efficiently. Designed to reduce plastic waste and energy consumption, making sustainability easy.

water-dispenser.name: WATER DISPENSER (W/O RO) - TRUBLU Series
water-dispenser.description: Stainless steel water dispensers give you fresh, clean water anytime. Compact, energy-efficient, and perfect for spaces where RO water is not readily available.

drinking-water-faucets.name: DRINKING WATER FAUCETS - WATERMATIC Series
drinking-water-faucets.description: Drinking water faucets with under the counter storage units to make access to fresh water simple. Precision-engineered for smooth flow, with a focus on reducing waste and energy use.

water-cooler.name: WATER COOLER & FOUNTAINS - ZVR Series
water-cooler.description: Water coolers cum bubblers provide chilled water on demand. Built to be energy-efficient, they're ideal for public spaces, reducing both costs and plastic waste.

public-utility.name: PUBLIC UTILITY SYSTEMS - PUS Series
public-utility.description: Designed for large public spaces, PUS systems ensure clean, accessible water. Engineered for durability and eco-friendliness, they support sustainable communities.

commercial-industrial.name: COMMERCIAL/INDUSTRIAL PLANTS
commercial-industrial.description: Power your facility with our large-scale hydration plants. Scalable and efficient, they offer high-volume water solutions with a commitment to sustainability.
